description:
The Demon Lord`s army has invaded the city, and http://anidb.net/ch115864 [Rose], http://anidb.net/ch115862 [Grimm], and http://anidb.net/ch115863 [Snow] can barely keep them back. Will http://anidb.net/ch114428 [Six] help them, even if it means being a good guy? 
Source: Funimation

titles.title: 戦闘員, 派遣します!
